summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5592 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 3, Mt. Baker Park Addition, being the alley between 30th Avenue South and 31st Avenue South, from McClellan Street to Lander Street; by grading and paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 73422, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
